trans-unit.source: Defines a rectangular brush with a hatch style, a foreground color, and a background color.
trans-unit.target: Definisce un pennello rettangolare con uno stile tratteggiato, un colore di primo piano e uno di sfondo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: A hatch pattern is made from two colors: one defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.BackgroundColor%2A>, which fills the background and one for the lines that form the pattern over the background defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.ForegroundColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Un motivo a tratteggio è composto da due colori: uno definito dal <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.BackgroundColor%2A>, che riempie lo sfondo e uno per le righe che formano il modello sullo sfondo definito per il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.ForegroundColor%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.HatchStyle%2A> property defines what type of pattern the brush has and can be any value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.HatchStyle%2A> proprietà definisce il tipo di modello il pennello ha e può essere un valore compreso tra il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: There are more than fifty elements in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Sono presenti più di 50 elementi di <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente mostra un'ellisse riempita con un motivo a tratteggio orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: ![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern")
trans-unit.target: ![Motivo di tratteggio](~/add/media/hatch1.png "motivo di tratteggio")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> shown in the previous illustration.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> illustrato nella figura precedente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> enumeration and foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> con l'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> e il colore di primo piano specificati.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> values that represents the pattern drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> che rappresenta il motivo disegnato da questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color of lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> che rappresenta il colore delle linee disegnate con questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> enumeration and foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> con l'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> e il colore di primo piano specificati.

trans-unit.source: The background color is initialized to black.
trans-unit.target: Il colore di sfondo viene inizializzato su nero.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> values that represents the pattern drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> che rappresenta il motivo disegnato da questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color of lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> che rappresenta il colore delle linee disegnate con questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the color of spaces between the lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> che rappresenta il colore degli spazi tra le linee disegnate con questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> enumeration, foreground color, and background color.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> con l'enumerazione <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" />, il colore di primo piano e il colore di sfondo specificati.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
trans-unit.target: Nella figura seguente mostra un'ellisse riempita con un motivo a tratteggio orizzontale.

trans-unit.source: ![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern")
trans-unit.target: ![Motivo di tratteggio](~/add/media/hatch1.png "motivo di tratteggio")

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.%23ctor%2A> to create the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> shown in the previous illustration.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.%23ctor%2A> per creare il <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush> illustrato nella figura precedente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color of spaces between the hatch lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il colore degli spazi tra le linee tratteggiate disegnate con questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the background color for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> che rappresenta il colore di sfondo per questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea una copia esatta dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> this method creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> creato da questo metodo di cui viene eseguito il cast come oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color of hatch lines drawn by this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il colore delle linee tratteggiate disegnate con questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structure that represents the foreground color for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> che rappresenta il colore di primo piano per questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hatch style of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stile tratteggiato di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> values that represents the pattern of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle" /> che rappresenta il motivo di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush" />.
